Articles.Content:
Yesterday and today (November 1 - 2), we celebrate 'Day Of The Dead' here in Mexico.

It is an ancestral and one of our cultural traditions. It\'s focused on gatherings of family and friends to pray for and remember friends and family members who have died. I like this holiday because all homes became colorful, with a lot of decorations: The offering, the skulls, the 'pan de muerto', Cempazuchitl flowers, etc.

It\'s particular and happy way to face death and that\'s how mexicans (we) are.

Cheers
May your DÃ­a de los Muertos be a good one
